Legendary Exploits.name: Legendary Exploits
Legendary Exploits.flavor: Your word is the call of destiny leading your allies into legend.
Legendary Exploits.target: You and each ally in the burst
Legendary Exploits.effect: Each target regains the use of a power of level 25 or lower, either an encounter power he or she has used during this encounter or a daily power he or she has used today. The power cannot be one that allows the target to regain the use of another power.
